baseline_groups.claim_summary: Public disclosure of politicians financial asset values is associated with better government effectiveness conditional on income democracy and press freedom.
baseline_groups.notes: Baseline coef is -0.20 (p=0.14) insignificant. Raw bivariate is positive but conditional on log GNI democracy and press freedom it turns negative.

global_notes: Cross-country OLS study (Djankov et al. 2010) with 175 countries. Baseline is insignificant (p=0.14). 69 total specs.
